minode.PIRIsTriggered: Get the PIR state (trigger or not).
minode.RGBSetColor: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color.
minode.onDHTEvent: Do something when DHT11 temperature change.
minode.onLightSensorEvent: Do something when Light level change.
minode.onMICEvent: Do something when MIC level change.
minode.onSwitchEvent: Do something when a switch is opened/closed
minode.rgbChooseColor: Choose an RGB color from the given table.
minode.switchIsOpened: Get the switch state (open or not).
